uevocher zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-B
uevochlein f
uevoar Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche B
uevocher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE>; Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>d
uevoeselben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-G
uevoertlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-H
uevoahner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und f
uevounffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schl
uevoassel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"The original XML contained several instances of the character ".\u00a7" which appears to be a corrupted representation of the letter 'u' or 'ü' in certain contexts, and ".\u00a4" which appears to be a corrupted representation of 'g'. These have been corrected to 'u' or 'ü' and 'g' respectively. Additionally, the format specifier ".\u2264" was consistently replaced with 'vo' to represent 'octavo' (8vo) which is a common book format abbreviation. The character ".\u00bch" was corrected to 'ü'."}
